alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:41AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy rainfall and minor flooding for parts of Southeast Massachusetts... At 638 AM EDT, Doppler radar was areas of moderate to heavy rain across much of southeast Massachusetts. The heaviest rainfall has occurred in the Fall River area. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Fall River, Taunton, Dartmouth, Bridgewater, Middleborough, Somerset, Swansea, Westport, Raynham, Lakeville, Freetown, Dighton and Berkley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Western Plymouth
